channel.title: Quick help
channel.description:
Now i messed up somewhere and i donnnt know what i did
I am using project insanity<3 and im tryint to add the skill cape emotions but im haveing trouble with tue button. I have made the scroller able to go down so it shows wehre the butten SHOULD be but i dont know how to add the actual icon for the butten
A quick tutorial or something on putting the butten there would help
Note* IM not asking for adding skill cape emotion tutorial JUST how to add the button because ive added skill cape emotions before im just evyr unfamillar with adding the butten THANKS <3
